channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @trekonomics Do you think there's a role for Mel Gibson in the cinematic adaptation of your French WIP?
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics Do you think there's a role for Mel Gibson in the cinematic adaptation of your French WIP?

item.description: @joshtpm The good news is that the Democratic mayor of Cliffside Park is up for re-election in 2023, so if the Senate doesn't work out, he can try hometown politics instead.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm The good news is that the Democratic mayor of Cliffside Park is up for re-election in 2023, so if the Senate doesn't work out, he can try hometown politics instead.

item.description: @Lexaphus https://t.co/yZEfFdLp4M
item.source:markdown: @Lexaphus https://t.co/yZEfFdLp4M

item.description: @JDaveCA @joshtpm My thought exactly. So if you dig the animation style, you’re probably happy to have a candidate with Bernie and a bong.
item.source:markdown: @JDaveCA @joshtpm My thought exactly. So if you dig the animation style, you’re probably happy to have a candidate with Bernie and a bong.

item.description: @MTakeshisan @cstross Advice for your future self: I recently confirmed that the book holds up on rereading after 15 years or so.
item.source:markdown: @MTakeshisan @cstross Advice for your future self: I recently confirmed that the book holds up on rereading after 15 years or so.

item.description:
@datadivajf I’m sorry, but this one strained my willing disbelief because of one central, inescapable flaw: That’s not how science fiction magazines worked.

@datadivajf Stories were written by freelancers.

@datadivajf As was, of course, TOS.
@RokhlK Wait. You can experience real sloths on Long Island now?
item.source:markdown: @RokhlK Wait. You can experience real sloths on Long Island now?

item.description: @EladNehorai Why do you hate the good citizens of Oz? https://t.co/jDjIk7EtiP
item.source:markdown: @EladNehorai Why do you hate the good citizens of Oz? https://t.co/jDjIk7EtiP

item.description: Normalize buying books for those you hate. https://t.co/TfSiB8LsLd
item.source:markdown: Normalize buying books for those you hate. https://t.co/TfSiB8LsLd

item.description: @frumfollies @atrupar @joshtpm Alfred. What a shame it is to lose one’s mind, to quote a former president.
item.source:markdown: @frumfollies @atrupar @joshtpm Alfred. What a shame it is to lose one’s mind, to quote a former president.

item.description: @brianlabelle @paulisci @toddpruner Pretty sure I’ve seen a similar sentiment sourced to Babylon a millenium or two earlier.
item.source:markdown: @brianlabelle @paulisci @toddpruner Pretty sure I’ve seen a similar sentiment sourced to Babylon a millenium or two earlier.

item.description:
@avischarf And Likud you can translate?

@avischarf And how come there’s no Davka party, speaking of the untranslatable?
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @MisfitTorah I have seen similar critiques based on other areas of knowledge, including those more central to the arguments.

item.description:
@AkivaMCohen @AndrewCMcCarthy Looking forward to challenging the next warrant for drugs and drug money on the grounds that absent the serial numbers on the currency the warrant is too “general.”

@AkivaMCohen @AndrewCMcCarthy But he’s being paid to preach stupid propaganda to an audience with no legal training
item.source:markdown:
@AkivaMCohen @AndrewCMcCarthy Looking forward to challenging the next warrant for drugs and drug money on the grounds that absent the serial numbers on the currency the warrant is too “general.”
@AkivaMCohen @AndrewCMcCarthy But he’s being paid to preach stupid propaganda to an audience with no legal training

item.description:
@trekonomics I’ve been told that this is the future AOC wants.

@trekonomics By the guy who thinks that since the ice caps were going to melt anyway at the nadir of the current glacial cycle, CO2 is no big deal.
item.source:markdown:
@trekonomics I’ve been told that this is the future AOC wants.
@trekonomics By the guy who thinks that since the ice caps were going to melt anyway at the nadir of the current glacial cycle, CO2 is no big deal.

item.description: @atrupar @joshtpm My Beloved Conservative Reletive believes that. Compared to Benjamin Dreyfus, just asking questions.
item.source:markdown: @atrupar @joshtpm My Beloved Conservative Reletive believes that. Compared to Benjamin Dreyfus, just asking questions.

item.description: @joshtpm In all fairness, all we know is he isn’t taking any legal advice.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm In all fairness, all we know is he isn’t *taking* any legal advice.

item.description: @DanielSeidemann עד שאיפק יבקש ממנו, למה אכפת לו? אם שמירת ישראל מנשק גרעיני כבר לא דו-פרטיסן, יש לו דמוקרתיה בצרות פה שצריך לשמור עליו.
item.source:markdown: @DanielSeidemann עד שאיפק יבקש ממנו, למה אכפת לו? אם שמירת ישראל מנשק גרעיני כבר לא דו-פרטיסן, יש לו דמוקרתיה בצרות פה שצריך לשמור עליו.

item.description: @TheMeltingPat @swordsjew Better than what?

item.description: @froomkin Someone should ask Patreus for comment.
item.source:markdown: @froomkin Someone should ask Patreus for comment.

item.description: @j_knifed @dick_nixon @tompeyer Sorry, no disrespect intended. I’m just wondering how current and former soldiers, even those who aren’t involved in highly classified material, are likely to feel about this.
item.source:markdown: @j_knifed @dick_nixon @tompeyer Sorry, no disrespect intended. I’m just wondering how current and former soldiers, even those who aren’t involved in highly classified material, are likely to *feel* about this.

item.description: @j_knifed @dick_nixon @tompeyer I mean more emotionally. I know that Basic Training provided a strong emotional respect for one’s rifle. How would a WWII naval officer get ingrained with a culture of respecting classified info?
item.source:markdown: @j_knifed @dick_nixon @tompeyer I mean more emotionally. I know that Basic Training provided a strong emotional respect for one’s rifle. How would a WWII naval officer get ingrained with a culture of respecting classified info?
